ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.head.title: ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.body.p:87-3
ds_grid_value_exists: With this function you can check to see if a specific value (real or string) is present within a rectangular area of a given DS grid. If it is present the function will return <tt>true</tt> otherwise it will return <tt>false</tt>.

ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.head.title: ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.body.p:90-3
ds_grid_value_exists: ds_grid_value_exists(index, x1, y1, x2, y2, val);

ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.head.title: ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:103-9
ds_grid_value_exists: The x position of the left of the region in the grid.

ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.head.title: ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:107-9
ds_grid_value_exists: The y position of the top of the region in the grid.

ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.head.title: ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:111-9
ds_grid_value_exists: The x position of the right of the region in the grid.

ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.head.title: ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:115-9
ds_grid_value_exists: The y position of the bottom of the region in the grid.

ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.head.title: ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.body.p:128-3
ds_grid_value_exists:
{ANY_CODE} if ds_grid_value_exists(grid, 0, 1, 5, 6, val)
{nbsp_x3}{
{nbsp_x3}xpos = ds_grid_value_x(grid, 0, 1, 5, 6, val);
{nbsp_x3}ypos = ds_grid_value_y(grid, 0, 1, 5, 6, val);
{nbsp_x3}}

ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.head.title: ds_grid_value_exists.htm+html.body.p:131-3
ds_grid_value_exists: The above code checks a DS grid for a specific value within a rectangular region. if it is found, it then stores the x and y position of the value in two variables for later use.
